people_also_ask.heading: Atari's iconic games, including Pong®, Asteroids®, Centipede® Missile Command®, have been played by many millions, and the brand continues to bring joy to gamers with its expanding portfolio of PC, console and mobile games. Atari's core businesses include video games, consumer hardware, licensing and blockchain.
